title: Puritanical whiners at MGTOW complain about women wearing leggings, calling them "slut pants"

author: matrixzone5
text: You've gotta be some extra virgin olive oil to complain about god's gift to humanity that is leggings.

author: Biffingston
text: Really?  Because I was a virgin into my 30s and I never was an MGTOW type.

author: matrixzone5
text: It's only a joke, sorry if it was offensive. You choose to do what you want to do my man more power to ya your body your choice.

author: Biffingston
text:
I'm not mad or anything.  (I turn 45 this month, its been a while)

Thank you for taking it in good grace.

author: [deleted]
text: Most normal people don't base their entire self worth around having sex so it's never an issue, these people have psychological issues.

author: Biffingston
text: You are aware you're agreeing with me right?  I'm legitimately not sure what tone you're trying to take here.

author: [deleted]
text: I'm saying you're normal, that's what I assume most people are until they prove otherwise.

author: Dannypan
text: These are the people that are bitter because they’re still virgins and blame it on women, not the fact they’re completely repulsive examples of society’s worst.

author: Biffingston
text:
Yes, but just because you're a virgin doesn't make you a red pill type. So it's kind of mean to associate the two as if they're the same.

And trust me, there's enough virgin shaming going on without it.

author: Dannypan
text: This is also true. I don’t get virgin shaming, it’s not like it matters whether someone’s had sex or not.

author: Biffingston
text:
Truth it, it was a long while until I didn't wish I was still a virgin.

Let me put it this way, the first time I was told I orgasmed. I don't remember it.  (Hope this isn't TMI)
